content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: rabbit_stew
inventory=[{"type": "scute", "quantity": 15, "index": 10}, {"type": "green_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 31, "index": 13}, {"type": "slime_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "cyan_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "potato", "quantity": 1, "index": 27}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "bowl", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: To craft a rabbit stew, I need to bake a potato. I have a potato in slot 27, so I will smelt it into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 27 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: rabbit_stew
inventory=[{"type": "scute", "quantity": 15, "index": 10}, {"type": "baked_potato", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "green_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 31, "index": 13}, {"type": "slime_spawn_egg", "quantity": 42, "index": 16}, {"type": "cyan_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 18}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "cooked_rabbit", "quantity": 1, "index": 30}, {"type": "carrot", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "bowl", "quantity": 1, "index": 39}]
thought: Now that the potato has been baked, I can move it to the crafting grid (eg., slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 23 to slot 2 with quantity 1

act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
